item.title: Massive Passives Effect on Commodities
item.description: “Massive Passive‚Äù has heavily influenced the equities sector, completely changing the dynamics of the stock market and the make-up of its participants. Now more people are getting exposure to commodities via long-only indexes and swap products. I am taking Irwin and Sanders’s paper The Impact of Index and Swap Funds on Commodity Futures Markets and extending it.
